Face Recognition NIST Face Recognition Technology Evaluation (FRTE) 1:1 Verification ranks our face recognition algorithm as the 20th most accurate in the world, featuring: * The smallest face template, at only 258 bytes. * The 2nd fastest face template extraction algorithm. * The 2nd fastest face matching algorithm. We are among the top 20 companies with the most accurate face recognition algorithms, according to the benchmark results released on March 13, 2023 , where the results of 491 face recognition algorithms were published. NIST Face Recognition Technology Evaluation (FRTE) 1:1 Verification ranks our face recognition algorithm as the 20th most accurate in the world, featuring: * The smallest face template, at only 258 bytes. * The 2nd fastest face template extraction algorithm. * The 2nd fastest face matching algorithm. We are among the top 20 companies with the most accurate face recognition algorithms, according to the benchmark results released on March 13, 2023 , where the results of 491 face recognition algorithms were published. Face Age Estimation NIST Face Analysis Evaluation (FATE) Age Estimation & Verification ranks our face age estimation algorithm as the 2nd most accurate in the world, with: * Mean absolute error (MAE) of only 2.8 years across all datasets. * 2.5 times faster than the only more accurate algorithm. * The smallest library and data footprint on disk among the top 5 algorithms. According to the benchmark results released in January, 2025 , which evaluated 19 face age estimation algorithms from 13 companies.
